title: Easy chocolate cake with chocolate icing
ingredients: ['225g butter', '4 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder', '250ml water', '250g plain flour', '325g dark brown soft sugar', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '75ml condensed sweetened milk', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'Icing', '50g butter', '4 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder', '180ml sweetened condensed milk', '125g icing sugar', '120g chopped walnuts']
